content: The Gold Ridge Beast can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge within the secret Kingdom of Shahali area. It is located in a chest on the far side of the area. You must open this chest before you defeat Fuban as the area becomes inaccessible once the boss is defeated.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Gold_Ridge_Beast.md', within the main section titled 'Gold Ridge Beast'.
The content is as follows:
The Gold Ridge Beast can be found in Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge within the secret Kingdom of Shahali area. It is located in a chest on the far side of the area. You must open this chest before you defeat Fuban as the area becomes inaccessible once the boss is defeated.
